inclusion.criterion: First presentation to cardiologist with suspected coronary artery disease
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No documented prior history of coronary artery disease
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Intermediate pre-test likelihood for coronary artery disease as defined by Diamond and Forrester criteria
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Clinically referred for invasive coronary angiography
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of severe chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) or chronic asthma
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Renal failure ( i.e. estimated glomerular filtration rate < 45 mL/min)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Use of sildenafil (Viagra) or dipyridamole (Persantin) that can not be terminated.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Concurrent or prior (within last 30 days) participation in other research studies
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of CAD s/p CABG, EF 60%, prior CVA without residual deficits. He is referred for evaluation of PVD and has carotid bruits on examination.
